text:
The 2019 Africa Cup of Nations (also called AFCON 2019 and CAN 2019) will be the 32nd edition of the Africa Cup of Nations tournament. The tournament will be hosted by Cameroon. But on January 9th, CAF changed the host. Egypt is the host of this tournament. It will be held from 7 to 30 June 2019.
Teams.
Because they withdrew from the 2017 Africa Cup of Nations qualification, Chad is banned from the tournament.
The following teams have qualified for the final tournament.
